name: Berserker
description: Some barbarians become berserkers – raging warriors of fury.

exploits.name: Frenzy
exploits.description: You can fly into a berserk rage. When berserk, you must attack the closest enemy, and move on to the next closest thereafter. You gain SOAK +5 (even when wearing armor) and +1d6 damage. Each round you rage for, you take 1d6 damage; you do not stop raging until you pass out or until all enemies are dead.

exploits.name: One with nature
exploits.description: When frenzied and wearing no armor, you gain a +4 MELEE DEFENSE bonus.

exploits.name: Regenerate
exploits.description: Every time you deal a killing blow while frenzied you gain +1d6 HEALTH.

exploits.name: Fearless
exploits.description: While frenzied, you are completely immune to fear, including the Afraid condition.
